entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
